song.title: First Time Breathing
song.intent:
Topic: Leaving the past behind and choosing yourself for the first time.
Mood: Hopeful, light, morning energy.
lyrics: I left my fears on an empty street
Old names fading under my feet
The sky feels wider than before
I’m not lost, I’m finally home
song.melody_description: Mid-tempo pop (95–105 BPM), acoustic guitar, soft synths, uplifting chorus.

song.title: Between the Words
song.intent:
Topic: Two people who still love each other, but know they can’t stay together.
Mood: Soft, intimate, late-night sadness.
lyrics: We talk in circles, afraid to fall
Your shadow still lives on my wall
I hold the truth inside my chest
Some goodbyes hurt when left unsaid
The room remembers you and me
A love we almost got to be
I walk away, but not too far
Still breaking under the same old star
song.melody_description: Slow piano ballad, 65 BPM, minimal drums, emotional vocal with long reverb.
